import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, Button, Grid } from "@material-ui/core"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import { MuiThemeProvider } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import { theme } from "../theme"; import lineLogo from "../assets/line.png"; import twiiterLogo from "../assets/twitter.png"; import noteLogo from "../assets/note.svg"; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ appBar: { position: "static", }, footerLinks: { padding: theme.spacing(1), }, games: { height: 48, }, blog: { height: 48, }, contact: { height: 48, }, line: { height: 48, }, twitter: { height: 48, }, copyright: { padding: theme.spacing(1), }, })); const Footer = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return (
2020 © Dabyss
); }; export default Footer; // 修正用にとりあえず見た目いい感じにできてるフッターをこっちに保存しておく { /*
2020 © Dabyss
*/ }
